column1: | for mitchell f. owens mitchell f. owens
column7: wi. born in burlington on january 14
column9: he was the son of willie and debra (nee lois) owens. he spent his entire lifetime in burlington where he attended mt. zion christian academy
column10: karcher school and graduated from burlington high school. mitchell worked at walmart and helped his brothers doing electrical work. he liked sports
column13: playing video games and spending time with his brothers and family. he is survived by his parents
column14: debra owens and willie (sharon) owens; siblings
column17: matthew owens and caitlyn owens. he is also survived by his grandparents
column18: mary & marc lois and lorraine owens; nephew
column20: brianna along with other relatives and friends. he was preceded in death by his grandfather
column21: john owens. services for mitchell will be held on saturday
column23: 2015 at 2:00 p. m. at schuette-daniels funeral home. visitation will be at the funeral home saturday
column24: june 13th from 12:00 noon until the time of the service. to send flowers or a remembrance gift to the family of mitchell f. owens please visit our tribute store. upcoming events13. jun. saturday visitation12:00 pm - 2:00 pm schuette-daniels funeral home625 browns lake drive
